title: Bloomberg Markets: States May Prevent Collection of User Info
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: States May Prevent Collection of User Info
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Todd Shields FCC Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing U.S. states may bolster consumer data privacy protections rolled back by the Trump administration. Laura Moy, Deputy Director of the Georgetown Center for Privacy and Technology, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
